A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Honestly\, I'm shocked at all the negative reviews! People need to get a grip. The movie was fantastic and new and had great character development and people need to stop hating one film for being too similar to the originals and then hating another for being too different (or just basically having tantrums because it didn't go the way they wanted it). A great film\, Rian and the actors have done star wars justice!
